name: That's Going In My Basket
description: That's Going In My Basket is a four player local multiplayer game in which the aim is to collect five items and head to the checkout. The chaotic nature of the competetive item grab is sure to entertain. This game was produced by a team of four individuals; Vaughan Smith- programmer, Toby Carlyon- environmental artist, Millie Knapp- producer and Hamza Al-Khudairi- character art.
